nodes.text: Gray Two was the call sign used by Lieutenant Telsij when he flew a Y-Wing in Gray Squadron during the Battle of Endor. Telsij's gunner was Karie Neth.

Wraith Squadron pilot Falynn Sandskimmer would also use the same call sign throughout her stay when the Wraiths pretended to be the crew of the Night Caller, which was aligned with Warlord Zsinj. Flying its complement of TIE Fighters, they adopted the designation of Gray Flight. She participated in both the Battle of Talasea and Ession as Gray Two.
